  • Method Details

    • getContent

      public List<String> getContent()
      Returns the content of this cell.
      Returns:
      the content data

    • getLine

      public String getLine(int index)
      Returns a specific line of this cell. This method returns an empty string if the index is argument greater or equal to the total amount of lines.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the line to return
      Returns:
      the content of the specified line

    • getLineCell

      public Cell getLineCell(int index)
      Returns a formatted cell object containing a specific line of this cell. This method returns an empty cell if the index is argument greater or equal to the total amount of lines.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the line to return
      Returns:
      the cell object of the specified line

    • setContent

      public void setContent(List<String> content)
      Sets the content of this cell.
      Parameters:
      content - the content data

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Returns the total width of this cell, in characters.
      Returns:
      the width of this cell

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Returns the total height of this cell, in lines.
      Returns:
      the height of this cell

    • hasLink

      public boolean hasLink()
      Returns whether this cell is a link.
      Returns:
      whether the cell is a link

    • getLinkURL

      public String getLinkURL()
      Returns the link url associated with this cell. This method will return null if this cell isn't a link.
      Returns:
      the link url

    • setLinkURL

      public void setLinkURL(String linkURL)
      Sets the link url associated with this cell. This method can be called regardless of whether this cell is a link. Setting the link url to null will mark this cell as not being a link.
      Parameters:
      linkURL - the link url

    • hasLinkTitle

      public boolean hasLinkTitle()
      Returns whether this cell has a link tooltip.
      Returns:
      whether this cell has a link tooltip

    • getLinkTitle

      public String getLinkTitle()
      Returns the link tooltip associated with this cell. This method will return null if this cell doesn't have a link tooltip.
      Returns:
      the link tooltip

    • setLinkTitle

      public void setLinkTitle(String linkTitle)
      Sets the link tooltip associated with this cell. This method can be called regardless of whether this cell has a link tooltip. Setting the link tooltip to null will mark this cell as not having a link tooltip.
      Parameters:
      linkTitle - the link tooltip

    • isBold

      public boolean isBold()
      Returns whether the content of this cell is bold.
      Returns:
      whether the content of this cell is bold

    • setBold

      public void setBold(boolean bold)
      Specifies whether the content of this cell should be bold.
      Parameters:
      bold - whether the content of this cell should be bold

    • isUnderlined

      public boolean isUnderlined()
      Returns whether the content of this cell is underlined.
      Returns:
      whether the content of this cell is underlined

    • setUnderlined

      public void setUnderlined(boolean underlined)
      Specifies whether the content of this cell should be underlined.
      Parameters:
      underlined - whether the content of this cell should be underlined

    • isStrikethrough

      public boolean isStrikethrough()
      Returns whether the content of this cell is strikethrough.
      Returns:
      whether the content of this cell is strikethrough

      Specifies whether the content of this cell should be strikethrough.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • of

      public static Cell of(String content, String linkURL, String linkTitle)
      Returns a new cell object containing the specified content and having the specified link associated with it.
      Parameters:
      content - the content
      linkURL - the link url
      linkTitle - the link title
      Returns:
      the cell object

    • of

      public static Cell of(String content, boolean isBold, boolean isUnderlined, boolean isStrikethrough, boolean isItalic)
      Returns a new cell object containing the specified content and style.
      Parameters:
      content - the content
      isBold - whether the content of this cell should be bold
      isUnderlined - whether the content of this cell should be underlined
      isStrikethrough - whether the content of this cell should be strikethrough
      isItalic - whether the content of this cell should be italic
      Returns:
      the cell object

    • of

      public static Cell of(String content, String linkURL, String linkTitle, boolean isBold, boolean isUnderlined, boolean isStrikethrough, boolean isItalic)
      Returns a new cell object containing the specified content and style and having the specified link associated with it.
      Parameters:
      content - the content
      linkURL - the link url
      linkTitle - the link title
      isBold - whether the content of this cell should be bold
      isUnderlined - whether the content of this cell should be underlined
      isStrikethrough - whether the content of this cell should be strikethrough
      isItalic - whether the content of this cell should be italic
      Returns:
      the cell object
